document_notes.text:
mysql-connector-java was updated to 5.1.35, fixing multiple bugs and a security issues.

- CVE-2015-2575: Unspecified vulnerability in the MySQL Connectors
  component in Oracle MySQL 5.1.34 and earlier allows remote authenticated
  users to affect confidentiality and integrity via unknown vectors related
  to Connector/J. (bnc#927981)

Please see http://dev.mysql.com/doc/relnotes/connector-j/en/news-5-1.html
document_notes.title: Details
